GlobalVariables.StudyDescription: This file contains the metadata, events, and data for REDCap project "PROTECT-CH Centres".
GlobalVariables.redcap:ProjectNotes: Site records and randomisation for the PROTECT-CH study.

redcap:DataQualityRules.rule_name: Data collection is stopped before trial treatment is stopped
Date trial treatment stopped is before randomisation date
Date data collection stopped is before randomisation date
Number of residents living at the care home at day 60 exceeds the care home capacity
Number of residents living at the care home at time of outbreak exceeds the care home capacity
Number of residents living at the care home exceeds the care home capacity

redcap:Surveys.title: Outbreak
redcap:Surveys.response_limit_custom_text: Thank you for your interest; however, the survey is closed because the maximum number of responses has been reached.

redcap:Surveys.title: Delegation Log Add
redcap:Surveys.instructions:
Please complete the delegation log entry.

Thank you!
redcap:Surveys.acknowledgement: Thank you for entering the delegation log details.
redcap:Surveys.response_limit_custom_text: Thank you for your interest; however, the survey is closed because the maximum number of responses has been reached.

redcap:Surveys.title: Delegation Log Remove
redcap:Surveys.instructions: Please complete the removal of a member of staff from the delegation log.
redcap:Surveys.acknowledgement: Thank you for keeping the delegation log up to date.
redcap:Surveys.response_limit_custom_text: Thank you for your interest; however, the survey is closed because the maximum number of responses has been reached.

redcap:Alerts.alert_title: Send PI eligibility list after outbreak
redcap:Alerts.email_subject: URGENT: Outbreak reported - Resident eligibility assessments required for Centre [record-name] - [centre_name]
redcap:Alerts.alert_message:
Dear PROTECT-CH investigators,

A PROTECT-CH trial care home has reported an outbreak of COVID-19.

Centre ID : [record-name]

Centre Name: [centre_name]

Please follow the below link in order to complete the eligibiltiy assessment for residents in this care home.

[form-link:list_of_pi_eligibility]

If you have any queries, please do not hesitate to contact the PROTECT-CH trial team.

protect-trial@nottingham.ac.uk

0115 748 7710

redcap:Alerts.alert_title: NCTU locking prescription, each resident's GP/PI eligibility
redcap:Alerts.email_subject: Prescription is signed by PI - Site [record-name]
redcap:Alerts.alert_message:
Site: [record-name]

The prescription for the above site has now be signed by a PROTECT-CH investigator.

The Data Management team must now complete the following tasks:

1. Lock Prescription form

2, Lock each GP confirmation of eligibility form in PROTECT-CH

3. Lock each central PI confirmation of eligibility form in PROTECT-CH 

4. Save each participant randomisation status in PROTECT-CH

redcap:Alerts.alert_title: Notify Care Home the treatment after randomised
redcap:Alerts.alert_message:
Dear  [centre_name],
 
This is to notify you that the residents in your care home have been randomised to receive [rando].

If you have any queries, please do not hesitate to contact the PROTECT-CH trial team.


Kind regards
PROTECT-CH trial research team

Telephone: 0115 7487710
Email: protect-trial@nottingham.ac.uk
Website: http://www.protect-trial.net

Centre ID : [record-name]

Centre Name: [centre_name]

Centre Address: [centre_address]

Centre Post Code: [centre_postcode]

Prescription Signed By [pi_name] on [pi_sign_date]

Prescription link : [form-link:prescription]

Dear research nurse team,

This is to notify you that PROTECT-CH trial treatment has just been distributed to the below care home.

Centre ID : [record-name]

Centre Name: [centre_name]

Treatment: [rando]

Pharmacy Dispatch Information: [form-link:pharmacy_dispatch]

Medication: [dispatch_type]

Dispatch Date: [dispatch_date]

Quantity: [dispatch_quant]

 

If you have any queries, please do not hesitate to contact the PROTECT-CH trial team.  

protect-trial@nottingham.ac.uk  

0115 748 7710

redcap:Alerts.alert_title: Send PI eligibility list after outbreak
redcap:Alerts.email_subject: URGENT: Outbreak reported - Resident eligibility assessments required for Centre [record-name] - [centre_name]
redcap:Alerts.alert_message:
Dear PROTECT-CH investigators,

 

A PROTECT-CH trial care home has reported an outbreak of COVID-19.

Centre ID : [record-name]

Centre Name: [centre_name]

Please follow the below link in order to complete the eligibiltiy assessment for residents in this care home.

Prescription: [form-link:list_of_pi_eligibility]

If you have any queries, please do not hesitate to contact the PROTECT-CH trial team.

protect-trial@nottingham.ac.uk

0115 748 7710

redcap:Alerts.alert_title: Notify GP of standard care after randomised
redcap:Alerts.email_subject: Information: Care home randomised to standard care in PROTECT-CH trial
redcap:Alerts.alert_message:
Dear [gp_practice], 

We wrote to you previously to tell you that your patient(s) at [centre_name] consented to take part in the PROTECT-CH trial to help find prophylactic treatments for COVID-19. Thank you for performing the eligibility checks and providing a copy of their medical record(s). We can now confirm that following a case of COVID-19 the care home has now been randomised and the patient(s) listed below will receive standard care.

As part of this trial, your patient(s)’s care home will undertake all their usual processes and procedures to manage the outbreak, but they will not administer any trial medication.

For more information on the trial please visit www.protect-trial.net and do not hesitate to contact us if you have any queries.

Yours sincerely

PROTECT-CH trial research team

Telephone: 0115 7487710
Email: protect-trial@nottingham.ac.uk

redcap:Alerts.alert_title: Notify CH to complete Follow up
redcap:Alerts.email_subject: Action required: Complete 60 day follow up for all participating residents
redcap:Alerts.alert_message:
Dear [centre_name] staff,

All residents still participating in the trial have now reached the 60 day follow up period.

 

Please log into REDCap and complete the EQ5D5L proxy, EQ5D5L Check, Healthcare Support and 60 Day Check forms. Residents who have capacity will also need to complete EQ5D5L questionnaire themselves.

You may assist them in completing the questionnaire, however the responses given should be their own.

If you have any further questions, please contact the trial research team (contact details below) who will be more than happy to help.

Kind regards
PROTECT-CH trial research team

Telephone: 0115 7487710
Email: protect-trial@nottingham.ac.uk
Website: http://www.protect-trial.net

redcap:Alerts.alert_title: Notify PI of new CH manager/senior user in DL
redcap:Alerts.email_subject: Alert to PI to notify them that the CH manager has added themselves to the delegation log and needs authorising
redcap:Alerts.alert_message:
Dear [centre_pi_name],  

This is to notify you that the manager of the above care home has added themselves to the delegation log for [centre_name_long]. This now needs your approval before they can proceed to delegate duties to their care home staff.  

Please follow the below link to authorise this member of staff as Care Home Lead.

[form-link:delegation_log_add:Click here to view new care home lead in delegation log]

Or log into https://redcap01.nottingham.ac.uk, choose PROTECT-CH Centres project, Advanced Reports - Delegation Log Senior CH users needing PI sign off.

If you have any further questions, please contact the trial research team (contact details below) who will be more than happy to help.  

Kind regards   

PROTECT-CH trial research team  

Telephone: 0115 7487710  
Email: protect-trial@nottingham.ac.uk  
Website: http://www.protect-trial.net

redcap:Alerts.alert_title: Alert Senior CH user that PI has authorised them to add others to the delegation log.
redcap:Alerts.email_subject: Alert to CH manager that PI has authorised their role and they may now progress to delegating responsibilities within the CH
redcap:Alerts.alert_message:
Dear [dl_schuname], 
 
This is to notify you that your PROTECT-CH Principal Investigator has authorised your role as Care Home Lead for PROTECT-CH. 
 
You may now follow the below link, in order to begin delegating responsibilities to members of staff in your care home. Please ensure that staff have completed the necessary PROTECT-CH training modules before they are delegated any trial responsibilities.

[survey_url_delegation_log]
 
If you have any further questions, please contact the trial research team (contact details below) who will be more than happy to help.  
 
Kind regards  
 
PROTECT-CH trial research team  
Telephone: 0115 7487710  
Email: protect-trial@nottingham.ac.uk  
Website: http://www.protect-trial.net

redcap:Alerts.alert_title: Notify GP of standard care after randomised
redcap:Alerts.email_subject: Information: Care home randomised to standard care in PROTECT-CH trial
redcap:Alerts.alert_message:
Dear [gp_practice], 

We wrote to you previously to tell you that your patient(s) at [centre_name] consented to take part in the PROTECT-CH trial to help find prophylactic treatments for COVID-19. Thank you for performing the eligibility checks and providing a copy of their medical record(s). We can now confirm that following a case of COVID-19 the care home has now been randomised and the patient(s) listed below will receive standard care.

As part of this trial, your patient(s)’s care home will undertake all their usual processes and procedures to manage the outbreak, but they will not administer any trial medication.

For more information on the trial please visit www.protect-trial.net and do not hesitate to contact us if you have any queries.

Yours sincerely

PROTECT-CH trial research team

Telephone: 0115 7487710
Email: protect-trial@nottingham.ac.uk
